leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 化学信息-分子表示与检索生态
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 表示库 + 向量检索 + index

tools.name: MungeSumstats
tools.one_line_profile: Standardisation and quality control tool for GWAS summary statistics
tools.detailed_description: A package to standardise and perform quality control on Genome-Wide Association Study (GWAS) summary statistics, enabling downstream analysis.

tools.name: Jupyter_Dock
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive molecular docking protocols and visualization workflows
tools.detailed_description: A set of Jupyter Notebooks serving as a workflow tool for performing molecular docking, visualizing results, and converting file formats interactively.

tools.name: xsmiles
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization library for SMILES strings and atom attributions
tools.detailed_description: A TypeScript library to visualize atom and non-atom attributions on chemical structures defined by SMILES strings, useful for interpretability in chem-AI.

tools.name: rdkit-scripts
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of utility scripts for RDKit-based cheminformatics tasks
tools.detailed_description: A set of Python scripts leveraging RDKit to perform common cheminformatics operations, simplifying workflows for chemical data processing.

tools.name: rdeditor
tools.one_line_profile: Simple GUI molecule editor based on RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A graphical user interface for editing molecular structures using RDKit and PySide, facilitating chemical structure input and modification.

tools.name: scikit-mol
tools.one_line_profile: Scikit-learn compatible molecular vectorization using RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A library providing scikit-learn compatible transformers for molecular vectorization (fingerprints, descriptors) using RDKit, streamlining ML pipelines in chemistry.

tools.name: wagl
tools.one_line_profile: Satellite imagery standardization and analysis ready data (ARD) generation
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for processing and standardising satellite imagery into Analysis Ready Data (ARD) forms, supporting earth observation research.

tools.name: standardised-image-reconstruction
tools.one_line_profile: Standardised image reconstruction for photoacoustic imaging
tools.detailed_description: A project providing standardised algorithms and tools for image reconstruction in photoacoustic imaging research.

tools.name: InChI
tools.one_line_profile: Official implementation of the IUPAC International Chemical Identifier
tools.detailed_description: The official C library for generating and processing the IUPAC International Chemical Identifier (InChI), a standard for molecular representation.

tools.name: RInChI
tools.one_line_profile: Reaction InChI implementation for chemical reactions
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Reaction InChI (RInChI) standard for representing chemical reactions, extending the InChI identifier system.

tools.name: InformaticsMatters Pipelines
tools.one_line_profile: Containerised components for cheminformatics workflows
tools.detailed_description: A collection of containerised tools and pipelines for cheminformatics and computational chemistry, facilitating reproducible workflows.

tools.name: chemical-converters
tools.one_line_profile: Encoder-decoders for translating chemical formats
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing encoder-decoder models to translate between different chemical file formats and representations.

tools.name: psikit
tools.one_line_profile: Interface bridging Psi4 and RDKit for quantum chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that integrates Psi4 (quantum chemistry) and RDKit (cheminformatics), allowing seamless workflows between molecular generation and QM calculations.

tools.name: molecule-resolver
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to resolve molecular structures from identifiers across databases
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool that automates the resolution of chemical identifiers to structures by querying multiple public databases.

tools.name: ctfile
tools.one_line_profile: Parser for chemical table files (CTfile)
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for parsing and handling chemical table files (CTfile) such as Molfile and SDfile, essential for chemical data IO.

tools.name: nfp
tools.one_line_profile: Keras layers for molecular deep learning with RDKit and Pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: A library providing Keras layers and utilities for building end-to-end deep learning models for molecules and materials, integrating with RDKit and Pymatgen.

tools.name: Clipboard-to-SMILES-Converter
tools.one_line_profile: Utility to convert clipboard chemical structures to SMILES
tools.detailed_description: A productivity tool that converts chemical structures copied to the clipboard into SMILES strings, facilitating data entry and interoperability.

tools.name: RanDepict
tools.one_line_profile: Generator for diverse chemical structure depictions
tools.detailed_description: A utility to generate varied chemical structure depictions with random styles and augmentations, useful for training optical chemical structure recognition (OCSR) models.

tools.name: JISA
tools.one_line_profile: Library for scientific instrument control and experiment automation
tools.detailed_description: A Java library for standardised instrument control, data handling, and GUI creation, designed for automating physics and engineering experiments.

tools.name: ccdutils
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for PDB Chemical Component Dictionary
tools.detailed_description: A set of Python tools to process and analyze small molecules from the wwPDB Chemical Component Dictionary using RDKit.

tools.name: Free-Wilson
tools.one_line_profile: Free-Wilson SAR analysis implementation
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the Free-Wilson method for Structure-Activity Relationship (SAR) analysis using RDKit.

tools.name: rd_filters
tools.one_line_profile: Structural alert filtering using RDKit and ChEMBL
tools.detailed_description: A script to filter chemical compounds based on structural alerts (e.g., PAINS, Glaxo) using RDKit and ChEMBL data, essential for library design.

tools.name: solubility
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of ESOL solubility prediction
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Delaney's ESOL (Estimated SOLubility) method for predicting aqueous solubility of organic molecules using RDKit.

tools.name: useful_rdkit_utils
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of helper functions for RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A library of reusable RDKit utility functions and Jupyter notebook helpers for common cheminformatics tasks.

tools.name: Kaplan
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular conformer searching package
tools.detailed_description: A package for performing conformer searches for molecules, aiding in structural analysis and modeling.

tools.name: PACKMAN
tools.one_line_profile: Protein structure and dynamics analysis package
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for analyzing protein structures and dynamics, providing an object-oriented interface similar to OpenBabel.

tools.name: ProteinDF
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular orbital calculation software for proteins
tools.detailed_description: Canonical Kohn-Sham molecular orbital calculation software optimized for large molecules such as proteins.

tools.name: phsmethods
tools.one_line_profile: Standardised methods for Public Health Scotland data
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing standardised methods and functions for public health data analysis and reporting within Public Health Scotland.

tools.name: RadonPy
tools.one_line_profile: Automated physical property calculation library for polymer informatics
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to automate physical property calculations for polymer informatics, specifically focusing on molecular dynamics simulations and property prediction.

tools.name: canonicalize_psmiles
tools.one_line_profile: Canonicalization tool for Polymer SMILES strings
tools.detailed_description: A tool specifically designed for the canonicalization of Polymer SMILES (BigSMILES/PSMILES) representations, facilitating standardized polymer informatics.

tools.name: NeuralPlayground
tools.one_line_profile: Standardised environment for hippocampus and entorhinal cortex models
tools.detailed_description: A standardized simulation environment for comparing and evaluating computational models of the hippocampus and entorhinal cortex in neuroscience.

tools.name: cheminformatics-microservice
tools.one_line_profile: Microservices for essential cheminformatics operations
tools.detailed_description: A set of microservices providing API access to standard cheminformatics functions, developed by the Steinbeck Lab (CDK developers).

tools.name: ScaffoldGraph
tools.one_line_profile: Library for generation and analysis of scaffold networks and trees
tools.detailed_description: An open-source cheminformatics library built on RDKit and NetworkX for generating and analyzing scaffold networks and scaffold trees to explore chemical space.

tools.name: formula_validation
tools.one_line_profile: Modules for molecular formula and adduct property calculations
tools.detailed_description: Python modules for calculating molecular formula properties, including monoisotopic mass and isotope patterns, specifically for mass spectrometry applications.

tools.name: moldrug
tools.one_line_profile: Package for drug-oriented optimization in chemical space
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for automating drug-oriented optimization tasks within chemical space, utilizing genetic algorithms or other optimization strategies.

tools.name: standartox
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for standardising toxicity data
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to retrieve, compile, and standardize aquatic toxicity data from various databases for ecotoxicological analysis.

tools.name: rdkit_ipynb_tools
tools.one_line_profile: RDKit utilities and visualization tools for Jupyter Notebooks
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools and helper functions to enhance the use of RDKit within IPython/Jupyter Notebooks, focusing on visualization and interactive analysis.

tools.name: partialsmiles
tools.one_line_profile: A validating SMILES parser with support for incomplete strings
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for parsing and validating SMILES strings, specifically designed to handle partial or incomplete SMILES, useful for interactive applications and chemical data entry validation.

tools.name: MayaChemTools
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of Perl and Python scripts for computational drug discovery
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive collection of command-line scripts and modules for manipulating and analyzing chemical data, supporting tasks like format conversion, property calculation, and structure analysis.

tools.name: MolPipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Scikit-learn compatible wrapper for RDKit molecular processing
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that integrates RDKit molecular processing into scikit-learn pipelines, facilitating machine learning workflows on chemical data.

tools.name: OpenSMILES.jl
tools.one_line_profile: OpenSMILES parser implementation in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library for parsing SMILES strings according to the OpenSMILES specification, enabling chemical structure manipulation within the Julia ecosystem.

tools.name: mols2grid
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive 2D molecule viewer for Jupyter notebooks
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides an interactive grid interface for visualizing 2D chemical structures from RDKit or pandas DataFrames, primarily for use in Jupyter notebooks.

tools.name: CDK (Chemistry Development Kit)
tools.one_line_profile: Open source Java library for chemoinformatics and bioinformatics
tools.detailed_description: A major Java library for structural chemo- and bioinformatics, providing methods for molecule generation, processing, analysis, and visualization.

tools.name: Chembience
tools.one_line_profile: Docker-based platform for chemoinformatics application development
tools.detailed_description: A platform providing curated Docker images and orchestration for building and deploying chemoinformatics services and web applications, integrating tools like RDKit and Jupyter.

tools.name: ChEMBL Structure Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Standardization pipeline for chemical structures used in ChEMBL
tools.detailed_description: The official protocol used by ChEMBL to standardize and salt-strip molecules, ensuring consistency in chemical structure representation across the database.

tools.name: ChEMBL Beaker
tools.one_line_profile: Standalone web server wrapper for RDKit functionality
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight web server that exposes RDKit functionality via a REST API, allowing chemical format conversion, descriptor calculation, and image generation over HTTP.

tools.name: ProLIF
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-Ligand Interaction Fingerprints generator
tools.detailed_description: A library to generate interaction fingerprints for protein-ligand complexes from molecular dynamics trajectories or docking poses, facilitating analysis of binding modes.

tools.name: rdchiral
tools.one_line_profile: Stereochemistry-aware reaction handling wrapper for RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A wrapper for RDKit's reaction handling functionality that improves the preservation and handling of stereochemistry during template-based reaction application.

tools.name: Datamol
tools.one_line_profile: High-level molecular processing library built on RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides a simplified, high-level API for RDKit, aiming to make molecular processing and manipulation more intuitive and robust for cheminformatics workflows.

tools.name: rdkit-scripts
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of command-line cheminformatics scripts using RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A set of command-line utilities for common cheminformatics tasks such as docking preparation, conformation generation, and molecular property calculation, built on RDKit.

tools.name: chemistry_drawer
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular visualization tool using RDKit and Plotly
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool that integrates RDKit's molecular processing capabilities with Plotly's interactive plotting to generate 2D and 3D visualizations of chemical structures.

tools.name: Indigo Toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Universal cheminformatics toolkit for molecular manipulation and rendering
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive cheminformatics library providing algorithms for molecule and reaction rendering, canonicalization, substructure search, fingerprinting, and format conversion (SMILES, Molfile, etc.).

tools.name: Indigo ELN
tools.one_line_profile: Open Source Chemistry Electronic Lab Notebook
tools.detailed_description: An Electronic Lab Notebook (ELN) system designed for chemists to record, manage, and search chemical experiments and reaction data.

tools.name: Ketcher
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based molecule sketcher and editor
tools.detailed_description: A web-based chemical structure editor that allows users to draw molecules and reactions, supporting various chemical formats and integration with cheminformatics backends.

tools.name: ClusterFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline tool for bioinformatics analyses on clusters
tools.detailed_description: A workflow management tool designed to automate and standardize bioinformatics analyses (such as NGS data processing) on cluster environments.

tools.name: Standardiser
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular standardisation tool for cheminformatics
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool for standardizing molecular structures, including tasks such as stripping salts, neutralizing charges, and standardizing tautomers, essential for preparing chemical datasets.

tools.name: Indigo (Genomics)
tools.one_line_profile: SNV and InDel discovery in chromatogram traces
tools.detailed_description: A tool for detecting Single Nucleotide Variants (SNVs) and Insertions/Deletions (InDels) in Sanger sequencing chromatogram traces, specifically for PCR products.

tools.name: Indigo Toolkit (Legacy)
tools.one_line_profile: Cheminformatics toolkit and RDBMS cartridge
tools.detailed_description: The legacy repository for the Indigo cheminformatics toolkit, providing C++ libraries for molecular manipulation and database cartridges (Bingo) for chemical search.

tools.name: ChemmineOB
tools.one_line_profile: OpenBabel wrapper package for R
tools.detailed_description: An R package that provides an interface to the OpenBabel C++ library, enabling chemical file format conversion and structure manipulation within the R environment.

tools.name: ESPsim
tools.one_line_profile: Scoring of shape and ESP similarity with RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for calculating molecular similarity based on 3D shape and Electrostatic Potential (ESP), utilizing RDKit and Psi4/XTB for quantum mechanical calculations.

tools.name: clusttraj
tools.one_line_profile: Agglomerative clustering for MD trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for analyzing Molecular Dynamics (MD) or Monte Carlo trajectories by performing agglomerative clustering to classify and group similar molecular structures.

tools.name: actel
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of acoustic telemetry data
tools.detailed_description: An R package for the standardized analysis of acoustic telemetry data, designed to track fish movement through receiver arrays.

tools.name: INDIGO Astronomy
tools.one_line_profile: Standards and frameworks for astronomy software
tools.detailed_description: A system of standards and software frameworks for multiplatform and distributed astronomy software development, enabling control of telescopes, cameras, and other astronomical instrumentation.

tools.name: POAP
tools.one_line_profile: Parallelized Open Babel & Autodock suite Pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline tool that automates and parallelizes ligand preparation (using Open Babel) and molecular docking (using AutoDock suite) for virtual screening.

tools.name: xyz2mol
tools.one_line_profile: Converts XYZ coordinates to RDKit mol object
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool that infers molecular connectivity and bond orders from 3D Cartesian coordinates (XYZ files) to generate valid RDKit molecular objects.

tools.name: AQME
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Quantum Mechanical Environments
tools.detailed_description: A reproducible workflow tool for automated conformer generation (RDKit/CREST), QM input creation, and post-processing of QM outputs for descriptor generation.

tools.name: QSAR-ready
tools.one_line_profile: Standardization workflow for QSAR-ready chemical structures
tools.detailed_description: A workflow for the standardization and pre-treatment of chemical structures to make them ready for QSAR modeling, handling cleaning, salt removal, and canonicalization.

tools.name: Scopy
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated negative design library for HTS/VS database design
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for screening undesirable compounds in High-Throughput Screening (HTS) and Virtual Screening (VS), implementing various filters and rules.

tools.name: scikit-chem
tools.one_line_profile: High level cheminformatics package built on RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A cheminformatics package for the Scientific Python stack that provides a high-level interface to RDKit functionality, aiming to integrate better with pandas and scikit-learn.

tools.name: PIDGINv3
tools.one_line_profile: Protein target prediction using random forests
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting protein targets for chemical compounds using random forest models and reliability-density neighbourhood analysis.

tools.name: eMolFrag
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular fragmentation tool based on BRICS algorithm
tools.detailed_description: A tool for decomposing molecules into fragments using the BRICS algorithm, useful for fragment-based drug design and molecular generation.

tools.name: PoseBusters
tools.one_line_profile: Plausibility checks for generated molecule poses
tools.detailed_description: A Python library and command-line tool to perform sanity checks on generated molecule poses, ensuring chemical and physical plausibility (e.g., bond lengths, clashes).

tools.name: molecular_rectifier
tools.one_line_profile: Automated correction of unsanitizable RDKit molecules
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to fix common valence and structural errors in molecules that fail RDKit sanitization, enabling them to be processed in downstream workflows.

tools.name: rdkit_to_params
tools.one_line_profile: Generate Rosetta params files from RDKit molecules
tools.detailed_description: A tool to create or modify Rosetta parameter files (topology) from RDKit molecule objects, facilitating the use of small molecules in Rosetta modeling.

tools.name: MolVS
tools.one_line_profile: Molecule Validation and Standardization
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for the standardization and validation of chemical structures, built on top of RDKit. It handles tautomers, charge neutralization, and fragment removal.

tools.name: PubChemPy
tools.one_line_profile: Python wrapper for the PubChem PUG REST API
tools.detailed_description: A library that provides a simple way to interact with the PubChem database in Python, allowing for searching, downloading, and manipulating chemical data.

tools.name: inchi-js
tools.one_line_profile: InChI generation library for the browser
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript compilation of the InChI library, allowing for the generation of InChI strings and InChIKeys directly in web browsers.

tools.name: chembl_ikey
tools.one_line_profile: Pure python implementation of InChiKey generation
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the InChIKey generation algorithm, allowing for key generation without external C library dependencies.

tools.name: openbabel-node
tools.one_line_profile: OpenBabel Bindings for Node.js
tools.detailed_description: Node.js bindings for the OpenBabel chemical toolbox, enabling chemical file conversion and property calculation in JavaScript environments.

tools.name: AMR
tools.one_line_profile: Functions to simplify and standardise antimicrobial resistance data analysis
tools.detailed_description: An R package for standardizing and analyzing antimicrobial resistance (AMR) data, including interpretation of MIC values and disk diffusion diameters according to EUCAST/CLSI guidelines.

tools.name: PALS
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for Analysing Lesions after Stroke
tools.detailed_description: A toolbox for the standardized analysis of stroke lesions using T1-weighted MRIs, facilitating quality control and reproducible research in neuroimaging.

tools.name: ODDT
tools.one_line_profile: Open Drug Discovery Toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A modular and comprehensive toolkit for drug discovery, providing functions for molecular interaction fingerprints, scoring functions, and virtual screening.

tools.name: Auto-CORPus
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline to standardise text and table data extracted from publications
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed to extract and standardize text and tabular data from full-text scientific publications, facilitating downstream NLP and omics data analysis.

tools.name: Open Babel
tools.one_line_profile: Chemical toolbox designed to speak the many languages of chemical data
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive chemical toolbox and library for converting between chemical file formats, searching, and analyzing chemical data.

tools.name: cmiles
tools.one_line_profile: Generate canonical molecule identifiers for quantum chemistry database
tools.detailed_description: A tool to generate canonical identifiers (SMILES, InChI) specifically tailored for indexing and retrieving molecules in quantum chemistry databases.

tools.name: imolecule
tools.one_line_profile: Embeddable webGL molecule viewer and file format converter
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript/Python library for embedding interactive 3D molecule visualizations in web pages and Jupyter notebooks, supporting various chemical file formats.

tools.name: pysmiles
tools.one_line_profile: A lightweight Python library for reading and writing SMILES strings
tools.detailed_description: A pure Python implementation for parsing and encoding SMILES (Simplified Molecular Input Line Entry System) strings, handling stereochemistry and various SMILES dialects without heavy dependencies.

tools.name: PLIP
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-Ligand Interaction Profiler for analyzing non-covalent interactions
tools.detailed_description: A tool to analyze and visualize non-covalent protein-ligand interactions in PDB files, detecting hydrogen bonds, hydrophobic contacts, pi-stacking, and other interaction types.

tools.name: rubabel
tools.one_line_profile: Ruby interface to the OpenBabel chemistry library
tools.detailed_description: A Ruby wrapper for the OpenBabel chemistry library, allowing manipulation of chemical data, file conversion, and cheminformatics tasks within Ruby applications.

tools.name: RDKit
tools.one_line_profile: Open source cheminformatics and machine learning software
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive collection of cheminformatics and machine learning software written in C++ and Python, providing functionality for molecule manipulation, descriptor generation, fingerprinting, and more.

tools.name: RDKit.js
tools.one_line_profile: JavaScript distribution of the RDKit cheminformatics functionality
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript library that exposes RDKit functionality for web applications, enabling client-side molecule rendering, SMILES parsing, and substructure search.

tools.name: SmilesDrawer
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight JavaScript parser and drawer for SMILES strings
tools.detailed_description: A robust and performant JavaScript library for parsing SMILES strings and generating high-quality 2D molecular structure diagrams in web browsers.

tools.name: chemicalite
tools.one_line_profile: SQLite extension for cheminformatics applications
tools.detailed_description: A chemical database extension for SQLite that adds support for molecular data types, SMILES storage, and chemical structure search capabilities directly within the database engine.

tools.name: rxn-standardization
tools.one_line_profile: Chemical compound standardization using language models
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool developed by IBM Research for standardizing chemical compound representations (SMILES) using data-driven language models, improving consistency for downstream tasks.

tools.name: physical_validation
tools.one_line_profile: Physical validation suite for molecular simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Python package to validate the physical consistency of molecular dynamics (MD) simulation results, checking ensemble properties and trajectory integrity.

tools.name: pgchem
tools.one_line_profile: PostgreSQL extension for chemical substructure search
tools.detailed_description: A PostgreSQL contrib package integrating OpenBabel functionality to enable storage, indexing, and substructure searching of chemical molecules within a Postgres database.

tools.name: taxpasta
tools.one_line_profile: Taxonomic Profile Aggregation and Standardisation tool
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool to standardise and aggregate taxonomic profiles generated by various bioinformatics profilers (like Kraken2, Metaphlan) into a single table for analysis.

tools.name: iodata
tools.one_line_profile: Library for computational chemistry file format conversion
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for reading, writing, and converting between various computational chemistry file formats, and generating input files for quantum chemistry software.

tools.name: Smiley
tools.one_line_profile: OpenSMILES compliant C++ SMILES/SMARTS parser
tools.detailed_description: A C++ parser implementation that strictly adheres to the OpenSMILES specification, providing robust parsing for SMILES and SMARTS strings in cheminformatics applications.

tools.name: pharmacophore-toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for generating pharmacophore models from RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts and notebooks to generate, visualize, and analyze simple pharmacophore models using RDKit, facilitating drug design workflows.

tools.name: molplotly
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive molecule visualization add-on for Plotly
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool that extends Plotly scatter plots to show 2D molecular structures on mouseover, facilitating interactive exploration of chemical datasets.

tools.name: StdToolheadOpenfoam
tools.one_line_profile: Standardised CFD workflow for 3D printer toolhead analysis
tools.detailed_description: A standardized OpenFOAM workflow configuration for performing Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) analysis on 3D printer toolheads.
